verses.name: Psalms 81:6
verses.text: I removed his shoulder from the burden: his hands were delivered from the pots.

verses.name: Psalms 81:7
verses.text: Thou calledst in trouble, and I delivered thee; I answered thee in the secret place of thunder: I proved thee at the waters of Meribah. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 81:8
verses.text: Hear, O my people, and I will testify unto thee: O Israel, if thou wilt hearken unto me;

verses.name: Psalms 81:9
verses.text: There shall no strange god be in thee; neither shalt thou worship any strange god.

verses.name: Psalms 81:10
verses.text: I am the Lord thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt: open thy mouth wide, and I will fill it.
